casebody.data:
Linda WILSON
v.
Denis VENTRIGLIA. No. 501P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005. Renny W. Deese, Fayetteville, for Ventriglia. Ralph S. Pennington, James W. Lea, III, Wilmington, for Wilson.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 19th day of September 2005 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of November 2005."
